title: Gmail app won't stop syncing on Pixel 3XL after OS Update 11(RQ3A.21605.005) and Gmail Version 2021.
content:
Gmail app won't stop syncing on Pixel 3XL after OS Update 11(RQ3A.21605.005) and Gmail Version 2021.05.16.376957181. 

Ever since the OS update on my Pixel 3XL my gmail app won't stop syncing. I have done the basics diagnostics clean data and cache on the gmail app and it worked temporary. This morning I woke up the app went back to sync and it has been syncing since 8am till now and it won't stop..

It has been syncing for an hour already
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
